channel.title: Proshop Apps Knowledge Base on PSTT Knowledge Base
channel.description: Recent content in Proshop Apps Knowledge Base on PSTT Knowledge Base

item.title: Proshop Apps
item.description: Proshop Apps linkProshop Apps are mobile apps built for golf courses. Our mobile apps are available for all courses but work best for those who are already using our electronic tee sheet and/or point of sale solution. Introduction linkThe following video provides a quick preview of our mobile apps including features and design. Get Started linkAdditional information can be found on our website including current pricing and setup fees.

item.title: First Login
item.description: report Existing Users: This page is intended for new users. Click here to login to your app management portal. Once logged in you can proceed onward through our docuemntation. Creating Your First Admin Account linkAfter your app design has been reviewed and approved there will be a short testing phase where you will have the opportunity to test your app on your devices before your app goes live on the App Store and Google Play Store.

item.title: Connections
item.description: Managing Connections linkYou can manage website and social media connections by clicking the ‘Connections’ tile within the management dashboard for your mobile app. On the connections page you can add, test, and remove connections. Adding Facebook Connections link To add a new Facebook connection click on ‘New Connection’ from the Connections page. Select ‘Facebook’ from the available connection types. You will be redirected to Facebook, follow the prompts on screen.
